verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> But now thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בֹּרַאֲךָ֣ <S%H1254><s%> that created יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> thee O Jacob וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <S%H3335><s%> and he that formed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> thee O Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for גְאַלְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H1350><s%> not for I have redeemed קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> thee I have called בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> [thee] by thy name לִי־ אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תַעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> When thou passest through בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the waters אִתְּךָ־ <S%H854><s%> for אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I וּבַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> I [will be] with thee and through the rivers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּךָ <S%H7857><s%> they shall not overflow כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תֵלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> through אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> the fire לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִכָּוֶ֔ה <S%H3554><s%> thou shalt not be burned וְלֶהָבָ֖ה <S%H3852><s%> neither shall the flame לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> kindle בָּֽךְ׃

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3467><s%> thy Saviour נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I gave כָפְרְךָ֙ <S%H3724><s%> [for] thy ransom מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopia וּסְבָ֖א <S%H5434><s%> and Seba תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> your place

מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you יָקַ֧רְתָּ <S%H3365><s%> Since thou wast precious בְעֵינַ֛י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight נִכְבַּ֖דְתָּ <S%H3513><s%> thou hast been honourable וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and I אֲהַבְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H157><s%> and I have loved וְאֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> thee therefore will I give אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> men תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <S%H8478><s%> your place וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> for thee and people תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> exchange נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> for thy life

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ־ <S%H854><s%> for אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I מִמִּזְרָח֙ <S%H4217><s%> from the east אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> not for I [am] with thee I will bring זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֖ב <S%H4628><s%> thee from the west אֲקַבְּצֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H6908><s%> and gather

אֹמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> I will say לַצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> to the north תֵּ֔נִי <S%H5414><s%> Give up וּלְתֵימָ֖ן <S%H8486><s%> and to the south אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּכְלָ֑אִי <S%H3607><s%> Keep not back הָבִ֤יאִי <S%H935><s%> bring בָנַי֙ <S%H1121><s%> my sons מֵרָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far וּבְנוֹתַ֖י <S%H1323><s%> and my daughters מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> from the ends הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> [Even] every one הַנִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> that is called בִשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> by my name וְלִכְבוֹדִ֖י <S%H3519><s%> him for my glory בְּרָאתִ֑יו <S%H1254><s%> for I have created יְצַרְתִּ֖יו <S%H3335><s%> I have formed אַף־ <S%H637><s%> even עֲשִׂיתִֽיו׃ <S%H6213><s%> him yea I have made

הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> Bring forth עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people עִוֵּ֖ר <S%H5787><s%> the blind וְעֵינַ֣יִם <S%H5869><s%> eyes יֵ֑שׁ <S%H3426><s%> that have וְחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> and the deaf וְאָזְנַ֥יִם <S%H241><s%> that have ears לָֽמוֹ׃

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <S%H1471><s%> Let all the nations נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> be gathered יַחְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> together וְיֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> be assembled לְאֻמִּ֔ים <S%H3816><s%> and let the people מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who בָהֶם֙ יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> who among them can declare זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> to us וְרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <S%H7223><s%> the former יַשְׁמִיעֻ֑נוּ <S%H8085><s%> this and shew יִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> add עֵֽדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5707><s%> their witnesses וְיִצְדָּ֔קוּ <S%H6663><s%> that they may be justified וְיִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> or let them hear וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> and say אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> [It is] truth

אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> You עֵדַי֙ <S%H5707><s%> Ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> and my servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom בָּחָ֑רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> whom I have chosen לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תֵּ֠דְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> that ye may know וְתַאֲמִ֨ינוּ <S%H539><s%> and believe לִ֤י וְתָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H995><s%> me and understand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> I am He לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> that I [am] he before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no נ֣וֹצַר <S%H3335><s%> formed אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> me there was no God וְאַחֲרַ֖י <S%H310><s%> neither shall there be after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will be none יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become ס

אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> I [even] I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <S%H1107><s%> and beside מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> me [there is] no saviour

אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> is I הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> I have declared וְהוֹשַׁ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3467><s%> and have saved וְהִשְׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> and I have shewed וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there בָּכֶ֖ם זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> when [there was] no strange וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you עֵדַ֛י <S%H5707><s%> [god] among you therefore ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַֽאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> and I אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> that I [am] God

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even מִיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> Yea before the day אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> I am He וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מִיָּדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> out of my hand מַצִּ֑יל <S%H5337><s%> [was] I [am] he and [there is] none that can deliver אֶפְעַ֖ל <S%H6466><s%> I will work וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> and who יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7725><s%> and who shall let ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גֹּאַלְכֶ֖ם <S%H1350><s%> your redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמַעַנְכֶ֞ם <S%H4616><s%> your sake שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> For your sake I have sent בָבֶ֗לָה <S%H894><s%> to Babylon וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <S%H3381><s%> and have brought down בָֽרִיחִים֙ <S%H1281><s%> all their nobles כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all וְכַשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> and the Chaldeans בָּאֳנִיּ֥וֹת <S%H591><s%> [is] in the ships רִנָּתָֽם׃ <S%H7440><s%> whose cry

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD קְדֽוֹשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H6918><s%> your Holy One בּוֹרֵ֥א <S%H1254><s%> the creator יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> your King ס

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which maketh בַּיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> in the sea דָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way וּבְמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עַזִּ֖ים <S%H5794><s%> in the mighty נְתִיבָֽה׃ <S%H5410><s%> and a path

הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> Which bringeth forth רֶֽכֶב־ <S%H7393><s%> the chariot וָס֖וּס <S%H5483><s%> and horse חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> the army וְעִזּ֑וּז <S%H5808><s%> and the power יַחְדָּ֤ו <S%H3162><s%> together יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <S%H7901><s%> they shall lie down בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> not יָק֔וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> they shall not rise דָּעֲכ֖וּ <S%H1846><s%> they are extinct כַּפִּשְׁתָּ֥ה <S%H6594><s%> as tow כָבֽוּ׃ <S%H3518><s%> they are quenched

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּזְכְּר֖וּ <S%H2142><s%> Remember רִֽאשֹׁנ֑וֹת <S%H7223><s%> ye not the former things וְקַדְמֹנִיּ֖וֹת <S%H6931><s%> the things of old אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְבֹּנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H995><s%> neither consider

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> Behold I will do חֲדָשָׁה֙ <S%H2319><s%> a new thing עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תִצְמָ֔ח <S%H6779><s%> now it shall spring forth הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תֵֽדָע֑וּהָ <S%H3045><s%> shall ye not know אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> will even אָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> it? I will even make בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness דֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way בִּֽישִׁמ֖וֹן <S%H3452><s%> in the desert נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5104><s%> [and] rivers

תְּכַבְּדֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H3513><s%> shall honour חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> The beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field תַּנִּ֖ים <S%H8577><s%> me the dragons וּבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> first יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <S%H3284><s%> and the ostriches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> because I give בַמִּדְבָּ֜ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters נְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H5104><s%> [and] rivers בִּֽישִׁימֹ֔ן <S%H3452><s%> in the desert לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> to give drink עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> to my people בְחִירִֽי׃ <S%H972><s%> my chosen
עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people זוּ֙ <S%H2098><s%> This יָצַ֣רְתִּי <S%H3335><s%> have I formed לִ֔י תְּהִלָּתִ֖י <S%H8416><s%> my praise יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> for myself they shall shew forth ס

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> קָרָ֖אתָ <S%H7121><s%> But thou hast not called יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> upon me O Jacob כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָגַ֥עְתָּ <S%H3021><s%> but thou hast been weary בִּ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of me O Israel

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הֵבֵ֤יאתָ <S%H935><s%> Thou hast not brought לִּי֙ שֵׂ֣ה <S%H7716><s%> me the small cattle עֹלֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H5930><s%> of thy burnt offerings וּזְבָחֶ֖יךָ <S%H2077><s%> me with thy sacrifices לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor כִבַּדְתָּ֑נִי <S%H3513><s%> neither hast thou honoured לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הֶעֱבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5647><s%> I have not caused thee to serve בְּמִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> with an offering וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הוֹגַעְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H3021><s%> nor wearied בִּלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3828><s%> thee with incense

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor קָנִ֨יתָ <S%H7069><s%> Thou hast bought לִּ֤י בַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> with money קָנֶ֔ה <S%H7070><s%> me no sweet cane וְחֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> me with the fat זְבָחֶ֖יךָ <S%H2077><s%> of thy sacrifices לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִרְוִיתָ֑נִי <S%H7301><s%> neither hast thou filled אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> Rather הֶעֱבַדְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H5647><s%> but thou hast made me to serve בְּחַטֹּאותֶ֔יךָ <S%H2403><s%> with thy sins הוֹגַעְתַּ֖נִי <S%H3021><s%> thou hast wearied בַּעֲוֹנֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5771><s%> me with thine iniquities ס

אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> I אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> who מֹחֶ֥ה <S%H4229><s%> I [even] I [am] he that blotteth out פְשָׁעֶ֖יךָ <S%H6588><s%> thy transgressions לְמַעֲנִ֑י <S%H4616><s%> sake וְחַטֹּאתֶ֖יךָ <S%H2403><s%> thy sins לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אֶזְכֹּֽר׃ <S%H2142><s%> for mine own sake and will not remember

אָבִ֥יךָ <S%H1><s%> father הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> Thy first חָטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> hath sinned וּמְלִיצֶ֖יךָ <S%H3887><s%> and thy teachers פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> have transgressed בִֽי׃
